markdownRemark.html: Located just a few minutes drive from the Costa del Sol, in an exclusive setting in the mountains and 30 minutes from Malaga, Marbella, Fuengirola, Benalmadena or Mijas. This resort includes magnificent facilities including 38 rooms, outdoor swimming pool, gardens, 3 function rooms, 18-hole golf course designed by Severiano Ballesteros, 2 restaurants, 2 bars, Club House, Caddy Masters, Pro Shop, football pitch, 2 tennis courts, gym, sauna and treatment rooms.

frontmatter.title: Alhaurín Golf Resort
frontmatter.description: Alhaurín Golf Resort - Located just a few minutes drive from the Costa del Sol, in an exclusive setting in the mountains and 30 minutes from Malaga, Marbella, Fuengirola, Benalmadena or Mijas. This resort includes magnificent facilities including 38 rooms, outdoor swimming pool, gardens, 3 function rooms, 18-hole golf course designed by Severiano Ballesteros, 2 restaurants, 2 bars, Club House, Caddy Masters, Pro Shop, football pitch, 2 tennis courts, gym, sauna and treatment rooms.
frontmatter.address: Ctra. A-387 Alhaurín el Grande - Mijas, Km. 3,4 CP 29120 Alhaurín el Grande, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 73.00 euros Highest green fee weekends 73.00 euros
